descriptions:
['DescriptionLuxhabitat is proud to present this large 1 bedroom apartment sitting on a higher floor with full Marina Views. There are only a couple of these units in the building, therefore you are very lucky to have this opportunity. All rooms face the wide stretch of Dubai Marina so you can fully appreciate the spectacular colours of the skyline whilst dining Al Fresco on your own private terrace. Vida Residence by Emaar in Dubai Marina is the closest high-quality residential tower to the Dubai Metro which transports you to the main attractions of Dubai, perfect for commuting as well as discovering new destinations at ease. The apartment is finished to high standards and the stylish architecture allows for light to pass throughout giving depth and character which will surely make it one of the most prominent buildings in Dubai Marina. 
Join the cosmopolitan crowd on your doorstep including world-class dining, entertainment, hotels, spas, and recreation all just steps away. Due for completion Q4 2020, available on a payment plan. Only 30% plus fees applicable to pay now until March 2020.
Special Launch Offer
3 years free holiday home management by EASE by Emaar
50% Dubai Land Department Fees Waiver
60/40 payment plan (40% on a 2-year post-handover payment plan)
Property Features
Fully Furnished Waterfront Homes
Infinity-edge Swimming pool
Valet Parking
24/7 Concierge Services
In short, this property will demand a very high rental income and capital growth due to floor level and offer high rental yield once completed. Located on the new Dubai Harbour, the home is situated on the new project logo island and is strategically positioned in Dubai Marina.']

['DescriptionAbout the Property:
- Spacious Master Bedroom w/ Bathroom
- Roomy Bedroom w/ Bathroom
- Modern Kitchen w/ Cabinets
- Living and Dining Area
- Car Parking
Budoor Villas:
Budoor Villa designed is inspired by the basic elements of the Arabian Desert tent that both creates shelter and provided shade. It is modular, open, and linear. Historically, as the tribe grew in numbers, the tents transformed into multi tents with courtyards that provided privacy, light wells, and breathable punctures. Over time, this further promoted the fragmentation of modules and spaces with different heights, sizes and sprawling horizontally forming circulation ruptures around the oasis.
Al Jurf Gardens is a natural masterpiece; an intricate tapestry of 500 landscape plots designed to seamlessly integrate within the natural, raw beauty of Al Jurf. 
Inspired by local culture, Al Jurf Gardens tames the wilderness of its surroundings to introduce refined architecture patterns repeated in different scales to reflect nature’s exquisiteness across every typology of homes, gardens, and courtyards.
AMENITIES:
-	Private Entrance
-	Private Beach
-	Private Marina
-	Community Centered
For viewing and more information call:+971502121141 - +97126719404
For more properties browse to: www.gravity-re.com']

WHO WE ARE?
AZCO Real Estate Brokers, LLC. is an award winning and culturally diverse brokerage that brings together a team of multilingual and highly qualified real estate brokers. AZCO utilizes extensive expertise of the local market and internationalism of real estate. At AZCO, we exercise a client centrode approach that helps us to deliver end-to-end property management and real estate solutions.
The company has massively expanded from its official inception in 2017 to a team of 30+ exceptionally talented real estate brokers and consultants. All the solutions rendered at AZCO are formulated with a result-oriented perspective, while our competent brokers are always on the lookout for ideal property investment opportunities.
Buyers, Sellers, and Tenants can reach us anytime. Thank you for Choosing Azco Real Estate!
